name: jennifer robertson
text: I purchased tickets for a show. When I was unable to attend due to COVID I tried to get a refund for my tickets. I called and emailed and left messages several times and no one ever got back with me so I was out the cost of 3 tickets.  Terrible organization and completely unprofessional.

resp.text: Please call my cell and I will be happy to remedy this... 904.607.4982
